subject: Hello
author: CamperMick
full_text:
I was wondering if Frank - or anyone else in the group - has a Facebook page. I would like to be friends. I have made a hack a couple years ago and really enjoy using it. I have eventually picked up a 'guide' with the box. I have had the opportunity to work with Rosemary Guiley and use the box that Frank had made for her. I can't say enough good things about the box. I have noticed also that while using the box, I pick up many evp over top of the frequencies. Has anyone else noticed this phenomena? Thanks for your time. If you would like to friend request or know Frank's page should he have one, leave a note with your request. Thank you everybody.

Mick

http://www.facebook.com/micksghosts
